# motabar.builds.stuff

> Your go-to data guy for tracking, analytics, and data pipelines

## About
Motabar is a data analytics and tracking specialist who helps businesses fix broken tracking, build data pipelines, and turn messy numbers into actionable insights. Based worldwide, serving clients globally.

## Services

### Track Your Marketing Accurately
Fix broken tracking, connect forms/calls/ads/CRM, enrich leads automatically with source data.
Outcome: Confidence in your numbers and the ability to cut wasted spend.

### Dashboards That Show What Matters
One place to see spend, revenue, CAC, and ROAS across campaigns.
Outcome: Faster decisions without platform hopping.

### Automated Reporting Systems
Automated data ingestion, daily refreshes, Slack/email alerts, historical trend analysis.
Outcome: Save hours weekly and spot issues early.

### Measure SEO & Organic Performance
Track keywords, rankings, organic conversions, AI overview impact.
Outcome: Clarity on where SEO is paying off.

### Fast Professional Websites
Conversion-optimized, mobile-ready, SEO-ready with built-in tracking.
Outcome: A site that converts and informs strategy.

### Tracking Audits
Check accuracy across platforms, analyze performance, prioritize fixes.
Outcome: Prioritized fixes and a roadmap to better insights.

### Workflow Automation & AI
Zapier, Make, n8n automations, custom GPTs and chatbots.
Outcome: Reduced manual work, enriched leads, scalable operations.

### Cloud Infrastructure & Data Pipelines
ETL pipelines, data warehousing with BigQuery, Snowflake, or Redshift.
Outcome: A single source of truth for all your business data.

## Pricing

- Starter: $250-$350 (Basic tracking audit, GA4 setup, documentation)
- Growth: $750-$1,200 (Full audit, multi-platform, dashboards, 30-day support)
- Performance: $2,000-$4,000 (Enterprise architecture, warehouse, ongoing support)
- Website Build: Starting at $600 (Modern design, tracking, SEO, mobile)

## Tech Stack

### Cloud Platforms
Google Cloud Platform, BigQuery, Snowflake, AWS, Redshift, Azure

### Analytics Tools
Google Analytics 4, Google Tag Manager, Segment, Mixpanel, Amplitude, Heap

### Data Engineering
dbt, Airflow, Fivetran, Python, SQL, Apache Spark

### Visualization
Looker Studio, Tableau, Power BI, Metabase, Superset

### Automation
Zapier, Make, n8n, Retool, Custom APIs

### Tracking
Server-side tracking, Conversion APIs, Facebook CAPI, Google Ads Enhanced Conversions

"Professional, thorough, and delivered ahead of schedule. Our tracking is finally working properly." - Emily T., Growth Lead
